Interface IntegerSelection

public interface IntegerSelection

Interface for a method selecting the nth highest integer in an array.

Version:
2014-07-10
Author:
Peter L. McArthur

Method Summary
 int select(int[] array, int rank)
          Return the nth highest integer in the given array.
 

Method Detail

select

int select(int[] array,
           int rank)
Return the nth highest integer in the given array.

Parameters:
array - a non-empty array of ints
rank - 0 for the highest integer, array.length - 1 for the lowest. Values outside the range [0..array.length - 1] are pulled into the valid range.
Returns:
the integer of the chosen rank in the array
